author: MountainMamas
title: Slow Cooker Chicken & Biscuits Recipe
ingredients: 21 oz condensed cream of chicken soup
21 oz condensed cream of chicken soup

instructions:
Place the chicken in a 7-quart (6 ½ liters) slow cooker. Sprinkle on salt & pepper.
Add the veggies and condensed soup, and mix thoroughly.
Cook on high for 3 hours.
Rip biscuit dough into small pieces, and drop evenly over chicken. Cook an additional hour.
description: A delicious comforting and hearty meal of Chicken and Dumplings (Biscuits) is just a perfect dinner that can be made in a crockpot while your at work or busy with the kids. This tender and juicy chicken is slow-cooked along side carrots and potatoes and a blend of savory spices.
category: slower cooker/crockpot, chicken, biscuits, gravy, slow-cook, nothing specific
instructions_list: Place the chicken in a 7-quart (6 ½ liters) slow cooker. Sprinkle on salt & pepper.
Add the veggies and condensed soup, and mix thoroughly.
Rip biscuit dough into small pieces, and drop evenly over chicken. Cook an additional hour.
